The Seville data can be loaded as follows, using a function in the **pctSeville** package:

```{r, message=FALSE, results='hide'}
library(pctSeville)
sev_dat = load_city_sev(data_dir = "../pctSeville-data/")
```

The results can be viewed as follow:

```{r}
sapply(sev_dat, class)
```


```{r}
library(sf)
plot(sev_dat$corredores_verdes)
```
